name: Soul & Brittle
description:
A woman looks for a significant other in the worst possible situation.

Author's comment:

I made this in 72 hours for a Game Jam. This is my first time writing something from start to end. It's also my first time making music. This whole project is the most I've ever been outside of my comfort zone as I tend to focus on making things look good and general direction. Sadly my brain gave up in  the last day and couldn't come up with more ideas for music, so there's only two tracks.
